snippet: Philipp M. Hildebrand bought and sold currency as he was directing monetary policy to control the rise of the Swiss franc, a magazine reported.
abstract: Philipp M Hildebrand, chairman of Switzerland's central bank, comes under pressure after Swiss magazine reports that he profited from currency trades made before and after he oversaw steps to prevent the Swiss franc from becoming too strong.
lead_paragraph: Philipp M. Hildebrand bought and sold currency as he was directing monetary policy to control the rise of the Swiss franc, a magazine reported.

headline.seo: Insider Trading Accusations Against Swiss Banking Head
headline.main: Insider Trading Accusations Are Reported Against Swiss Bank’s Chairman
headline.print_headline: Insider Trading Accusations Are Reported Against Swiss Bank’s Chairman
